client.state

Class GameplayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.state.GameplayState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscardingState, DomesticTradeState, InitialState, NotMyTurnState, PlayingState, RobbingState, RollingState, SetupState

    public abstract class GameplayState
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the generic state. This state allows nothing to be done, and returns false for all can-do methods. GameplayState contains methods to set the various states of the controllers so that they can use the allowed/necessary methods.
